com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml

Class EPPResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml.EPPResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.transform.URIResolver

    public class EPPResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.transform.URIResolver
    Provides URI to Source resolution service as specified by the URIResolver interface. Uses the debug level logger.

    • Method Detail

      • getResolvedURIs

        public java.lang.String[] getResolvedURIs()
        List the namespace uniform resource identifiers for which this instance provides a mapping. These must be ordered in such a way that the an XML schema identified by getResolvedURIs()[i] does not depend on an XML schema identified by getResolvedURIs()[j] where j > i.
        Returns:
        The URIs identifying XML schemas for which this instance provides URI to local resource mappings.

      • resolve

        public javax.xml.transform.Source resolve(java.lang.String href,
                                 java.lang.String base)
                                   throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Resolve a public URI to a local system resource suitable for providing as input to creating a Schema object.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface javax.xml.transform.URIResolver
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - The given href doesn't map to any available resource on the system.
